ModuleInfo.Description: This module gives general information about the device
ModuleInfo.Name: _System

ModuleInfo.Description: This module is responsible for setting measuring mode and resetting dsp adjustment data
ModuleInfo.Name: ModeModule1

ModuleInfo.Description: This module measures reference actual values for configured channels
ModuleInfo.Name: REFERENCEModule1

PAR_IgnoreRmsValues.Description: Percentage of nominal range below which channel values are ignored

PAR_IgnoreRmsValuesOnOff.Description: Enable or disable channel ignore limit option

PAR_PreScalingGroup0.Description: Scaling factor for group k (see configuration)

PAR_PreScalingGroup1.Description: Scaling factor for group k (see configuration)

PAR_PreScalingGroup2.Description: Scaling factor for group k (see configuration)

ModuleInfo.Description:
This module is responsible for range handling,
 range setting, automatic, adjustment and scaling
ModuleInfo.Name: RangeModule1

ACT_DFTPN1.Description: Actual value phase/neutral / cartesian format: re,im

ACT_DFTPN2.Description: Actual value phase/neutral / cartesian format: re,im

ACT_DFTPN3.Description: Actual value phase/neutral / cartesian format: re,im

ACT_POL_DFTPN1.Description: Actual value phase/neutral / polar format: abs,rad[0,2π],deg[0,360]

ACT_POL_DFTPN2.Description: Actual value phase/neutral / polar format: abs,rad[0,2π],deg[0,360]

ACT_POL_DFTPN3.Description: Actual value phase/neutral / polar format: abs,rad[0,2π],deg[0,360]

ModuleInfo.Description: This module measures configured order dft values for configured channels
ModuleInfo.Name: DFTModule1

ACT_CanChangePhaseMask.Description: Boolean indicator that current measurement mode can change phase mask

ACT_MaxMeasSysCount.Description: Number of max measurement systems for current measurement mode

ACT_PQS4.Description: Actual power value sum all phases

ModuleInfo.Description: This module measures power with configured measuring and integration modes
ModuleInfo.Name: POWER1Module1

ACT_MulResult.Description: Multiple measurements: JSON result array / statistics

ACT_RefFreqInput.Description: Reference frequency input to find power module

PAR_ClientActiveNotify.Description: By changing this component, a client asks us for max actualize performance

PAR_DutConstantAuto.Description: Calculate DUT constant to get ~0% error

PAR_DutConstantIScaleDenom.Description: Scale the dut constant in case tranformers are used (I fraction denominator)

PAR_DutConstantIScaleNum.Description: Scale the dut constant in case tranformers are used (I fraction numerator)

PAR_DutConstantUScaleDenom.Description: Scale the dut constant in case tranformers are used (U fraction denominator)

PAR_DutConstantUScaleNum.Description: Scale the dut constant in case tranformers are used (U fraction numerator)

PAR_DutTypeMeasurePoint.Description: Scale the dut constant in case tranformers are used (Measurement point selection)

PAR_MeasWait.Description: Multiple measurements: Seconds to wait between measurements

PAR_Target.Description: REF pulses for 0% error - set automatically

ModuleInfo.Description: This module provides a configurable error calculator
ModuleInfo.Name: SEC1Module1

ModuleInfo.Description: This module is responsible for reading and providing system Status information
ModuleInfo.Name: StatusModule1

ModuleInfo.Description: This module measures configured number of harmonic power values from configured input values
ModuleInfo.Name: BleModule1
